title: Have to match exactly
content:
Hi. I need help with exact matches for these two. Can anyone help? :) Thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [FONT\_id.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015115218/http:/typophile.com/files/FONT_id.jpg) | 18.28 KB |
author: Sianita

comments.content:
Concrete, see [Copperplate Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015115218/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/copperplate/fonts/), a light weight. Several vendors. Several weights. Larger image gets an exact match.  
Don
